name: Perlindrones
description:
Perlindrones is a local multiplayer twinstick shooter. Your mission is to collect orbs and throw them at the other players. Choose your orbs wisely! Each one has a different effect.

Furthermore you can select one of 4 abilities to match your play style! 

The stage is constantly in motion so use your positioning and timing strategically.

FEATURES:

  •  2 to 4 Player
  •  8 different orbs
  •  4 abilities
  •  Dynamic obstacles
  •  One hit mode
  •  Adjust the gamespeed up to 200%
  •  Use the reflecting edges for your advantage
  •  Kickass music
  •  Support for Xbox 360, PS3 and PS4 controllers

Can't have friends over? Consider using parsec to stream the game and play remotely.
